overview: Escape into the mind, body, and soul of lesbian lovers! Share their desires, taste their passion, feel the intensity of their lovemaking. Savor the experience! Be Our Guest! You are cordially invited to feel the passion and experience the magic in this all-girl video. Come play with us! This is one invite you don't want to miss! This movie is created by a woman for women!
title: Intimate Invitation 8
